original_text: The crowd saw what Paul had done. They began to shout in their own language that the people of Lycaonia spoke. ‘The gods have become like men and they have come down from the sky to us,’ they said.
korean_text: 무리가 바울이 한 일을 보고 루가오니아 방언으로 소리 질러 이르되 신들이 사람의 형상으로 우리 가운데 내려오셨다 하여

sentences.original_text: The crowd saw what Paul had done.
They began to shout in their own language
that the people of Lycaonia spoke.
and they have come down from the sky to us,'
